title: Automatic Generation Control
description: AGC. Automatic regulation of the power output of generators.

sections.title: Definition by NERC
sections.body_md: > Means equipment that automatically adjusts a Control Areaâ€™s generation from a central location to maintain its interchange schedule plus Frequency Bias.

sections.title: Definition by FERC
sections.body_md: > The automatic regulation of the power output of electric generators within a prescribed range in response to a change in system frequency, or tie-line loading, to maintain system frequency or scheduled interchange with other areas within predetermined limits.
